page.title: 06SHOPPING IN HOLYMOORSIDE 1
page.content:
{ }A survey was conducted to investigate people's shopping habits. A sample of 46 people was used and four questions were asked. { {1) How often do you shop in {Holymoorside?
Every 3 or more less than 3 once/ day times/week times/week week 13 11 7 14
The survey suggests that most people use the local shops only once per week. Many of those surveyed were {pensioners}who could not shop frequently and were collecting their weekly pensions. The large number of shoppers using Holymoorside daily could be explained by people collecting such as {newspapers.
